ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS GBO Fort Simpson Fluxgate Magnetometer
ResourceHeader.Description: The magnetometer at the THEMIS/Fort Simpson station. FSIM is part of the University of Alberta CARISMA network. It records 3-axis magnetic field measurements at 2Hz frequency.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically I. Mann for use of the GMAG data, and the CSA for support of the CARISMA network.
